law.catch_line: Operator of self-service storage facility may offer and sell insurance on behalf of a limited lines self-service storage space insurance producer -- Conditions -- Producer is responsible for operator's acts.

text.section: Notwithstanding KRS 304.9-421 and 304.9-425, a self-service storage facility operator, including its employees, whose activities relating to insurance are limited to offering and disseminating insurance on behalf of and under the direction of a limited lines self-service storage space insurance producer meeting the conditions as set forth in this section, may offer and disseminate insurance.
As the insurer's designee, the limited lines self-service storage space insurance producer is responsible for the acts of the self-service storage space operator.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2014.
